items.name: Full English Breakfast
items.description: Spicy beef sausages, hash browns, fried egg, homemade tomato sauce, mushrooms, baked beans with toast and butter. (40p Extra for scrambled egg).

items.name: Veggie Breakfast
items.description: Vegetarian sausages, hash browns, fried egg, homemade tomato sauce, mushrooms, baked beans with toast and butter. (40p Extra for scrambled egg)

items.name: Med Omelette
items.description: A deliciously light two egg omelette mixed with red onions, sweetcorn, mushrooms, cherry tomatoes, green olives, mixed herbs, topped with melted cheese, cooked to perfection under the grill. Served with toast & butter. Ask for jalapenos or red chilli flakes for added spice.

items.name: Chicken Toasty
items.description: Chicken breast, cherry tomatoes, red onions, jalapenos, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil and cheese.

items.name: Steak and Onion Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Beef steak and fried onions cooked in extra virgin olive oil topped with our homemade chilli and mustard mayo sauce. Served with steakhouse chips.

items.name: Pesto Chicken Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Roast chicken slices, pesto, caramelised onions, cherry tomatoes, jalapenos, red onions and melted cheese.

items.name: Roast Beef Melt Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Slices of roast beef with dijon mustard, red onion, juicy ripe tomatoes, freshly ground black pepper and a dash of extra virgin olive oil. Add some spice with jalapenos (40p) just ask.

items.name: Going South Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Slow roasted chicken, tomato, jalapeno peppers with a spicy homemade sauce. Add some caramelised onions for a sweet and savoury taste (50p) - just ask.

items.name: Tuna Melt Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Tuna flakes, green olives, red onions, black pepper, mayo, dash of extra virgin olive oil and melted cheese. Ask for any other toppings , jalapeno, sweetcorn, tomatos (40p per topping)

items.name: Lamb Shish Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Mouth-watering lamb shish topped with caramelised onions, tomatoes, homemade spicy sauce and melted cheddar cheese. A personal recommendation from the chef!

items.name: Piri Piri Chicken Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Chicken pieces marinated overnight and cooked to perfection. Includes fresh juicy cherry tomatoes, red onions, homemade piri sauce topped with melted cheese.

items.name: Mexicana Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Spicy chilli con carne, jalapenos, kidney beans, tomatoes, red onion with melted cheese. If you don’t want jalapenos, please ask!

items.name: Ambro’s Belly Buster Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Named after our valued customer, ambro who made this sandwich and it’s been a hit with all our customers. Spicy beef sausage meat, dijon mustard, caramelised onions, mushrooms, jalapenos, scrambled egg and melted cheese.

items.name: Tomato & Cheese Melt Vegetarian Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Our version of the classic melt! Filled with mature cheddar, mozzarella topped with caramelized onion and oregano. Why not add some jalapenos (40p) for a bit of spiciness!

items.name: Tuscani Vegetarian Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Pesto, mushrooms and oozing with melted cheese. Highly recommended - absolutely delicious! Add jalapenos (40p) for some extra spice

items.name: Veggie Supreme Vegetarian Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Cherry tomatoes, olives, sweetcorn, red onions, topped with melted cheddar cheese. Add jalapenos (40p) for some extra spice.

items.name: The Med Vegetarian Grilled Sandwich
items.description: Garlic infused butter ciabatta with fresh tomatoes and finished with melted cheese. Tastes absolutely fantastic! Add jalapenos (40p) for some extra spice

items.name: Veggy Flatbread Pizza
items.description: Mushrooms, peppers, spring onions, rocket, cherry tomatoes, green chillies, olives, 3 cheeses, feta, mozzarella and cheddar.

items.name: Chicken Flatbread Pizza
items.description: Marinated chicken pieces, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, sweetcorn, green chillies, red onions, topped with 3 cheeses, feta, cheddar and mozzarella.

items.name: Meat Flatbread Pizza
items.description: Grilled mincemeat, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, green chillies, red onions, sprinkle of olive oil, topped with 3 cheeses, feta, cheddar and mozzarella.

items.name: Pesto Flatbread Pizza
items.description: Organic pesto, bell peppers, cherry tomatoes, green chillies, red onions, oregano, black pepper topped with 3 cheeses, feta, cheddar and mozzarella.

items.name: Cheese Savoury Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Mild mature cheddar mixed with red onions, sweetcorn, lettuce and luxury mayonnaise

items.name: Chicken & Sweetcorn Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Slow roast chicken breast, mixed with luxury mayonnaise, sweetcorn and lettuce with a sprinkle of fresh ground black pepper.

items.name: Cheese Salad Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Mature cheddar, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, lettuce, red onions and a dash of extra virgin olive oil.

items.name: Spicy Feta Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Crumbly feta cheese mixed with extra virgin olive oil, red onions, green olives, cherry tomatoes, jalapenos, salsa and mixed herbs.

items.name: Coronation Chicken Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Roast chicken breast diced and mixed with homemade curry spice, chopped apricots & mixed chopped nuts in a creamy mayonnaise.

items.name: Roast Beef (Cold) Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Strips of beef slow roasted with red onions, lettuce, tomatoes, creamy mayonnaise, jalapenos, freshly ground black pepper and dijon mustard. If you are not a fan of mustard, please ask to exclude it or replace with mayo

items.name: Tuna Crunch Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Tuna flakes mixed with red onions, sweetcorn, lettuce and luxury mayonnaise.

items.name: Salmon Classic Gourmet Cold Sandwich
items.description: Smoked salmon, cucumber, lettuce, black pepper, dash of extra virgin olive oil topped with creamy homemade dill and chive sauce.

items.name: Cheese Savoury Jacket Potato
items.description: Cheese mixed with red onions, sweetcorn, lettuce and creamy mayonnaise

items.name: Tuna Crunch Jacket Potato
items.description: Tuna flakes mixed with red onions, sweetcorn, lettuce and luxury mayonnaise.

items.name: Coronation Chicken Jacket Potato
items.description: Roast chicken breast diced and mixed with homemade curry spice, chopped apricots & mixed chopped nuts in a creamy mayonnaise.

items.name: Beef Salad
items.description: Strips of roast beef seasoned with salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil and hint of chilli sauce. Mixed with red onions, carrots, sweetcorn, lettuce, cucumber, green olives and cherry tomatoes.

items.name: Chicken Caesar Fresh Salad Bowl
items.description: Lettuce, cucumber, red onions, sweetcorn, green olives, cherry tomatoes, julien carrots topped with garlic infused chicken breast, dash of extra virgin olive oil and Caesar sauce.

items.name: Smoked Salmon Fresh Salad Bowl
items.description: Smoked salmon mixed with red onions, sweetcorn, lettuce, cucumber, green olives carrots and cherry tomatoes. Seasoned with black pepper and topped with extra virgin olive oil and caesar dressing.

items.name: Greek Fresh Salad Bowl
items.description: Traditional Greek feta served on a bed of crisp lettuce, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, green olives, red onions mixed with extra virgin olive oil and Italian herbs.

items.name: Smorgasbord Special Salad
items.description: Tuna mayo, smoked salmon, cheddar cheese, lettuce, apricots, red onions, tomatoes, carrots, olives, mixed nuts, sweetcorn topped with extra virgin olive oil and ceasar dressing.

items.name: Chicken Arabiatta
items.description: Homemade arabiatta sauce cooked with chicken, tomatoes, red onions and a sprinkle of cheese. Spice it up with red chilli flakes or jalapenos. Just ask!

items.name: Alpollo
items.description: Garlic infused chicken breast cooked in a scrumptious creamy sauce. You can add mushrooms and jalapenos for 80p extra.

items.name: Bolognaise
items.description: Mildly spiced bolognaise sauce cooked to perfection over 4 hours.

items.name: Pesto Chilli Chicken
items.description: Chicken cooked in garlic infused extra virgin olive oil, pesto, cherry tomatoes, green chillies and fresh basil. Fancy melted cheese on top? Just ask

items.name: Pesto Pasta
items.description: Penne pasta cooked in extra virgin olive oil, pesto and fresh basil topped with Parmesan. Why not ask for melted cheese on top?

items.name: Pasta Aglio Olio Peperoncino
items.description: Classic Italian pasta with garlic, extra virgin olive oil, red chilli flakes, parmesan and basil. Add melted cheese for £1.

items.name: Houmous Dip
items.description: Served with pitted olives, homemade houmous topped with extra virgin olive oil, mixed herbs, cuts of bloomer & salad.

items.name: Chilli Con Carne with Chips
items.description: Add melted cheese for £1

items.name: Nachos with Chilli
items.description: Add melted cheese for £1

items.name: Nachos
items.description: Tortilla chips with jalapeno, sour cream & melted cheese.

items.name: Spicy Feta
items.description: Feta cheese, extra virgin olive oil, fresh tomatoes, red onions, chopped jalapenos, salsa, oregano, cuts of bloomer and fresh salad.

items.name: Jacket Wedges
items.description: Served with our homemade sour cream.

items.name: Seekh Kebabs
items.description: Two chunky seekh kebabs, salad & mint sauce.

items.name: Veg Samosa
items.description: 3 Veg samosa’s salad & mint sauce.

items.name: Meat Samosa
items.description: 3 Meat samosa’s salad & mint sauce.

items.name: Chicken Goujons Kiddies Corner
items.description: Chicken Goujons, Chips and Beans or Salad

items.name: Breakfast Kiddies Corner
items.description: One meat or veg sausage, fried egg, beans, hash brown & toast

items.name: Espresso Single
items.description: An instant hit, guaranteed to wake you up!

items.name: Machiatto
items.description: An espresso with a dash of frothed milk.

items.name: Caramel Machiatto
items.description: Vanilla syrup, topped with hot milk, freshly ground espresso and a drizzle of caramel.

items.name: Americano
items.description: An espresso topped with hot water & served with or without milk, a stronger alternative to filtered coffee

items.name: Cappuccino
items.description: An espresso topped with equal amounts of hot milk & froth topped with a sprinkle of chocolate.

items.name: Latte
items.description: A long coffee made with 2 shots of espresso, steamed milk & a topping of small froth.

items.name: Vanilla Latte
items.description: A long coffee made with 2 shots of espresso, steamed milk & a topping of small froth and vanilla syrup

items.name: Mochachino
items.description: Espresso mixed with chocolate and topped with steamed milk & froth.

items.name: Hazelnut Mocha
items.description: Espresso mixed with chocolate, hazelnut syrup and topped with steamed milk & fresh vanilla whipped cream.

items.name: Nut Cracker
items.description: Coffee, toffee nut syrup, chocolate, caramel, whipped cream & crushed nuts

items.name: Winter Warmer
items.description: Coffee, pumpkin spice syrup topped with whipped cream & cinnamon sugar

items.name: Frappuccino - 500ml
items.description: A cold creamy coffee. Blended espresso, ice & milk with your choice of syrup. Caramel Frappe is quite nice!

items.name: Caramel Ice - 500ml
items.description: 2 Shots of espresso mixed with ice, milk and caramel syrup.

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description: Add homemade whipped cream for an additional 40p

items.name: Caramel Peanut Butter
items.description: Contains: Mixed Nuts

items.name: Berry Go Round - 500ml
items.description: Raspberry, blackberry, strawberry

items.name: Coco Loco - 500ml
items.description: Mango, pineapple, coconut, lime, mint

items.name: Detox Zing - 500ml
items.description: Blueberry, carrot, ginger, banana, courgette

items.description: Mango, spinach, kale

items.description: Mango, strawberry
